All Classes

Class Description
Action  
ActionInputData
Information about an action, retrieved from parsing the input test files
Actor
Class that keeps all the information needed for actors
ActorInputData
Information about an actor, retrieved from parsing the input test files
ActorsAwards
Awards for actors to be used for queries
Checker
Checker to verify the correctness of the tests.
Checkstyle
Checker to verify the coding style
Command  
Constants
The class contains the minimum of constants needed.
Data
A class that copies all the input information
Genre
The types of movies/series that will be used in the tests
Input
The class contains information about input
InputLoader
The class reads and parses the data from the tests
Main
The entry point to this homework.
Manager
Class that runs the actions
Movie
Class that keeps all the information needed for movies
MovieInputData
Information about a movie, retrieved from parsing the input test files
Query  
QueryTest
DO NOT MODIFY The class that contains the id and message of each QueryTest
Recommendation  
Season
Information about a season of a tv show
Serial
Class that keeps all the information needed for serials
SerialInputData
Information about a tv show, retrieved from parsing the input test files
Show
Show class represents a video i.e a movie or a serial.
ShowInput
General information about show (video), retrieved from parsing the input test files
Test
Use this if you want to test on a specific input file
User
Class that keeps all the information needed for users
UserInputData
Information about an user, retrieved from parsing the input test files
Utils
The class contains static methods that helps with parsing.
Writer
The class writes the output in files
